property.name: taskId
property.description: Comma-separated list of task IDs indicating tasks whose results should be collected

property.name: contextId
property.description: Comma-separated list of context IDs indicating task contexts whose results should be collected

property.name: benchmarkId
property.description: Comma-separated list of benchmark IDs indicating benchmarks whose results should be collected

property.name: taskWarmupSkew
property.description: Number of results that should be skipped from each task

property.name: contextWarmupSkew
property.description: Number of results that should be skipped from each context

property.name: from
property.description: Date from which results should be selected

property.name: to
property.description: Date to which results should be selected

property.name: groupId
property.description: ID of the result group that should be used
